      • startVideoStream

        public void startVideoStream(android.view.Surface surface,
                             java.lang.String tag,
                             boolean enableLocalRecording,
                             AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Attempt to grab ownership and start the video stream from the connected drone. Can fail if the video stream is already owned by another client.
        Parameters:
        surface - Surface object onto which the video is decoded.
        tag - Video tag.
        enableLocalRecording - Set to true to enable local recording, false to disable it.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution status.
        Since:
        2.5.0

      • startVideoStream

        public void startVideoStream(android.view.Surface surface,
                             AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Attempt to grab ownership and start the video stream from the connected drone. Can fail if the video stream is already owned by another client.
        Parameters:
        surface - Surface object onto which the video is decoded.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution status.
        Since:
        2.5.0

      • stopVideoStream

        Stop the video stream from the connected drone, and release ownership.
        Parameters:

      • switchCameraCaptureMode

        public void switchCameraCaptureMode(byte captureMode,
                                    AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Switches the camera capture mode.
        Parameters:
        captureMode - One of SoloGoproConstants.CAPTURE_MODE_VIDEO, SoloGoproConstants.CAPTURE_MODE_PHOTO, SoloGoproConstants.CAPTURE_MODE_BURST, SoloGoproConstants.CAPTURE_MODE_TIME_LAPSE
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution status.
        Since:
        2.6.8
